text:
[Verse]
Steppin' in the puddles
Feel the rhythm flow
Raindrops like a heartbeat
Together we can glow

[Verse 2]
Spin around in circles
Laughin' at the sky
No need for umbrellas
Let's just fly so high

[Chorus]
Dancin' in the rain
No worries and no pain
Let the storm we feel
Make everything so real

[Bridge]
Lightning strikes the night
We’re blinded by the light
Hold on to the dream
In this crazy wet scene

[Verse 3]
Soggy shoes ain't stoppin'
Jump into the splash
We'll keep movin' forward
Till the thunder bash

[Chorus]
Dancin' in the rain
No worries and no pain
Let the storm we feel
Make everything so real
title: Dancing In The Rain
